lyrics.stanza: In the Testament of old See th' acacia wood with gold; Such humanity behold! Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, praise the Lord!
Types and shadows to us show Jesus is the man to know. Now this man in us must grow— Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord!
Lord, may Thy humanity Permeate us thoroughly, Drawing many men to Thee— Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord!
